claim_card.claim: A staged experimental path is proposed: short-term Φ-plateau controllers, medium-term RGPx-native chips with mapped variables, long-term substrate-agnostic coherence fields.
claim_card.test_hook: Convert each stage into one minimal prototype spec + KPI; treat as a roadmap scorecard.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Short term : Φ-plateau controllers ... Medium term : RGPx-native chips ... Long term : substrate-agnostic coherence fields.
